publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1710 Pauline McNeill: Glasgow University Rector—That the Parliament congratulates Greg Hemphill on becoming the 118th rector at the University of Glasgow, and welcomes his stated assurance to the students whom he represents that he will work hard on their behalf.

S1M-1710 Pauline McNeill: Glasgow University Rector—That the Parliament congratulates Greg Hemphill on becoming the 118th rector at the University of Glasgow, and welcomes his stated assurance to the students whom he represents that he will work hard on their behalf.
S1M-1710 Glasgow University Rector (lodged on 1 March 2001) Mary Scanlon*
S1M-1710 Glasgow University Rector (lodged on 1 March 2001) Linda Fabiani*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-1710 Glasgow University Rector (lodged on 1 March 2001) Andrew Wilson*
S1M-1710 Glasgow University Rector (lodged on 1 March 2001) Mr Michael McMahon*

S1M-1710 Pauline McNeill: Glasgow University Rector—That the Parliament congratulates Greg Hemphill on becoming the 118th rector at the University of Glasgow, and welcomes his stated assurance to the students whom he represents that he will work hard on their behalf. Supported by: Mary Scanlon, Linda Fabiani, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Andrew Wilson, Mr Michael McMahon
S1M-1710 Glasgow University Rector (lodged on 1 March 2001) Tricia Marwick*, Fiona McLeod*
S1M-1710 Glasgow University Rector (lodged on 1 March 2001) Robin Harper*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-1710 Glasgow University Rector (lodged on 1 March 2001) Dr Elaine Murray*

S1M-1710 Pauline McNeill: Glasgow University Rector—That the Parliament congratulates Greg Hemphill on becoming the 118th rector at the University of Glasgow, and welcomes his stated assurance to the students whom he represents that he will work hard on their behalf. Supported by: Mary Scanlon, Linda Fabiani, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Andrew Wilson, Mr Michael McMahon, Tricia Marwick, Fiona McLeod, Robin Harper, Ms Sandra White, Dr Elaine Murray
S1M-1710 Glasgow University Rector (lodged on 1 March 2001) Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*, Mr John Home Robertson*, Alasdair Morgan*, Trish Godman*

S1M-1710 Pauline McNeill: Glasgow University Rector—That the Parliament congratulates Greg Hemphill on becoming the 118th rector at the University of Glasgow, and welcomes his stated assurance to the students whom he represents that he will work hard on their behalf. Supported by: Mary Scanlon, Linda Fabiani, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Andrew Wilson, Mr Michael McMahon, Tricia Marwick, Fiona McLeod, Robin Harper, Ms Sandra White, Dr Elaine Murray, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Mr John Home Robertson, Alasdair Morgan, Trish Godman

S1M-1710 Pauline McNeill: Glasgow University Rector—That the Parliament congratulates Greg Hemphill on becoming the 118th rector at the University of Glasgow, and welcomes his stated assurance to the students whom he represents that he will work hard on their behalf. Supported by: Mary Scanlon, Linda Fabiani, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Andrew Wilson, Mr Michael McMahon, Tricia Marwick, Fiona McLeod, Robin Harper, Ms Sandra White, Dr Elaine Murray, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Mr John Home Robertson, Alasdair Morgan, Trish Godman

S1M-1710 Pauline McNeill: Glasgow University Rector—That the Parliament congratulates Greg Hemphill on becoming the 118th rector at the University of Glasgow, and welcomes his stated assurance to the students whom he represents that he will work hard on their behalf. Supported by: Mary Scanlon, Linda Fabiani, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Andrew Wilson, Mr Michael McMahon, Tricia Marwick, Fiona McLeod, Robin Harper, Ms Sandra White, Dr Elaine Murray, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Mr John Home Robertson, Alasdair Morgan, Trish Godman
